title: Chicken Pasta with Tomato Filets
directions: Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water and drain .
Wash the tomatoes and cook it until the tomatoes are soft .
Once it becomes hot and add the shredded chicken .
Heat until very hot and you can add the garlic , garlic , limee and zest and cook it until golden .
Saute it in a couple of minutes , stirring constantly for the flavors to discard !
